answers.answer: By flat small intestine, do you mean you've had an endoscopy and the biopsy showed you had flattened villi in the small intestine? If so, how did they rule out celiac disease?

question: What other causes and treatments can be given for flat small intestines? I have lost 36 lbs. I am overweight, have diabetes. I can afford to loose 70 more, but would rather do it intentionally and in a healthy fashion.
title: negative for celiac still have flat small intestines
